Package slogo.model

Class Palette

java.lang.Object
slogo.model.Palette
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<PaletteObserver>
public class Palette
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable<PaletteObserver>
An observable palette that holds Color and Shape objects that can be referenced by index. The palette holds an active color, which notifies all listeners when changed. Color information is obtained from a ResourceBundle.

  • Method Details

    • getActiveColor

      public javafx.scene.paint.Color getActiveColor()
      Returns the color that is current active
      Returns:
      the currently active Color object

    • setActiveColor

      public void setActiveColor​(int index)
      Sets the color referenced by index as the active color, also notifies all PaletteObserver.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of color needed

    • setNewColor

      public void setNewColor​(int index, java.lang.String hexValue)
      Create a new color and set it as the active color by supplying a String containing a hex value. If the user inputs an invalid string, a SLogoException will be thrown.
      Parameters:
      hexValue - a string representation of a hex color value.

    • getColorAtIndex

      public javafx.scene.paint.Color getColorAtIndex​(int index)
      Returns the color at the specified index. Throws a SLogoException if the index does not have a color associated.
      Parameters:
      index - index desired for the color
      Returns:
      a Color object or null
